sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faCalendarAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { Col, Row, Card, Button, Badge, Dropdown, ButtonGroup, InputGroup, Form, FormSelect, Container } from '@themesberg/react-bootstrap'; import { Plans } from "../../components/Widgets"; import setAuthToken from "../validation/authAuthToken"; const axios = require('axios').default; export default () => { const [link, setLink] = useState("") const [plans, setPlans] = useState([]) const [planID, setPlanID] = useState("") const [toggle, setToggle] = useState({ plan: 0, switch: false }) let token = localStorage.getItem("token"); useEffect(() => { setAuthToken(token); fetchPlans(token) }, []) let fetchPlans = async (token) => { try { const response = await axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL}/api/investment-plans`, { headers: { 'authorization': `Bearer ${token}`, 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) let res = response.data if (res.status === true && res.code === 200) { setPlans(res.data) console.log(res.data) } } catch (err) { console.error(err); } } const invest = (e, id) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(id) setToggle({ plan: id, switch: true }) } let handleReferralCopy = (e) => { e.preventDefault() navigator.clipboard.writeText(link) } return ( <>
Welcome to Vangaurd Investments - your personal client area.
Your referral ID: handleReferralCopy(e)}>Click to copy referral link
{toggle.switch == false &&
Choose an Investment Plan
{plans ? plans.map((plan, key) => { return
{plan.name}
{plan.rate}% in {plan.duration} {plan.duration_label}
Min. Deposit:
${plan.min_amount}
Max. Deposit:
${plan.max_amount}
{/* {plan.description} */} Trade the {plan.name} and access benefits like earning up to {plan.rate}% Weekly on your crypto.
}) : null} } {toggle.switch == true && {/*
Withdraw Funds From Your Wallet
Minimum Investment Amount (USD) Minimum Investment Amount (USD) Enter Amount (USD)
Balance: $0.00
Investment amount will be charged from your balance
*/} } ); };
